reviewText: Awesome version of the classic tale. Closely follows the 1946 original with unusual effects and imagery. Recommended!
This is honestly an amazing movie, I recommend it to anyone who enjoys fairy tales and romance with a dark twist in it.

Love this movie! It came a lot quicker than expected. It has english subtitles, so I was able to enjoy it as it is. The only warning I have to give is that this doesn't play on most DVD players in the US, so watch out for that. All in all, I'm very happy with my purchase!
It's a great movie and the dvd copy iis watch pretty well. It is a pity that the extras are not subtitled in English
